proverbs: Clarity of mind brings fruitful beginnings.
The enlightened walk with steady steps.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] teaches the harmony of clarity and action.
Light your path with wisdom and compassion.

meaning: Deep spiritual insight through mystery and surrender.
proverbs: In the silence of mystery, wisdom speaks.
Surrender opens the door to light.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] reveals strength found in humility and inward knowing.
Embrace the unknown to find peace.

proverbs: Clear thought guides the enlightened soul.
Growth is born from understanding.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] emphasizes the blend of knowledge and spirit.
Apply wisdom to deepen your light.

proverbs: Guard your spirit as a precious treasure.
Protection nurtures spiritual growth.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] teaches to defend what nourishes the soul.
Secure your foundation to rise higher.

proverbs: Healing waters flow from clear springs.
Renewal breathes life into the soul.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] encourages spiritual cleansing and rebirth.
Let clarity refresh your spirit.

proverbs: Light and swift minds adapt and renew.
Change is the soul’s dance.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] emphasizes embracing the flow of spiritual change.
Move gracefully with the spirit’s currents.

proverbs: True power flows from clear words and upright actions.
Spirit speaks through steady voice.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] teaches the sacred duty of truthful speech.
Let your voice reflect your inner light.

meaning: Strength through trials balanced by spiritual clarity.
proverbs: The bright mind endures the fiercest storm.
Balance is power amid strife.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] guides through hardship with calm wisdom.
Hold your center in the eye of the storm.

proverbs: The steadfast spirit breaks through all barriers.
Strength and wisdom conquer all.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] affirms the power to transcend limitation.
Advance with courage and clarity.

proverbs: Wisdom reveals traps hidden in plain sight.
Spiritual eyes see beyond the veil.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] teaches vigilance and discernment.
See with the spirit, walk with wisdom.

meaning: Discipline as foundation for spiritual peace.
proverbs: Discipline brings harmony to the spirit.
Peace follows steady mastery.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] stresses self-control as a spiritual art.
Rule your inner kingdom with gentle hand.

proverbs: Renewal flows with the tides of persistence.
The soul’s fire never dims.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] celebrates the eternal cycle of growth.
Persevere through transformation to find new life.

proverbs: Harmony is the song of the enlightened.
Peace flows from balanced spirit.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] embodies the promise of spiritual peace.
Walk in harmony with all creation.

proverbs: True wealth nurtured by spiritual roots.
Prosperity thrives in a mindful heart.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] encourages balance between material and spiritual success.
Let your fortune reflect your soul’s depth.

proverbs: Purity clears the way for new blessings.
Healing flows when spirit opens.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] guides through purification towards renewal.
Let go of what binds you to rise.

meaning: Clarity and destiny fulfilled through enlightened choice.
proverbs: Clarity opens the door to destiny.
Enlightened choices carve the path ahead.
verses: [translate:Òtúrá Méjì] crowns spiritual journeys with clarity and confidence.
Walk boldly in the light of your truth.
